kvs.subtitle: --- FAIR DAO (A Transparent and Decentralized Autonomous Organization)
kvs.subdescription: FAIR tokens are launched fairly on the SunPump platform, with no presale, no additional issuance, and no allocation plans.
kvs.page-description-opensource: We have open-sourced most of our code. If you have spare time, join us to promote the growth of FAIR DAO.
kvs.dao-1-des: The FAIR protocol is managed by a decentralized global community. All FAIR token holders, developers, and ecosystem participants can contribute ideas and suggestions for governance.
kvs.dao-2-des: All FAIR DAO votes are generated on-chain and cannot be tampered with, ensuring fairness, efficiency, and transparency in governance.
kvs.dao-3-des: Everyone is equal. FAIR tokens are issued and traded on the SunPump platform with no presale mechanism or team allocation.
kvs.dao-4-des: Ecosystem participants build open-source applications by staking FAIR tokens, jointly creating a thriving ecosystem.

open-items.name: Shared Library
open-items.des: The FAIR DAO Shared Library is a framework for rapid development of desktop and mobile applications, supporting mainstream mobile, PC, and web browsers.

open-items.name: Ecosystem Application
open-items.des: Fair Box serves as the carrier for ecosystem applications, integrating Tron Wallet and Ethereum Wallet.

open-items.name: Official Website
open-items.des: Source code of the current website.
